body:
Hi Mark,


Today with this processor:


model name      : Intel(R) Pentium(R) 4 CPU 3.00GHz
cpu MHz         : 2992.578


512 Mb of RAM, linux 2.4.26 patched with openmosix and
compiling radiance with gcc 3.3.4 and these compile options


-Dlinux -DMC -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -L/usr/X11R6/lib -I/usr/include/X11
-DNOSTEREO -march=pentium4 -malign-double -mno-ieee-fp -mfpmath=sse -O3
-ffast-math -fomit-frame-pointer -fstrict-aliasing -ftracer


I got this:


 14.54 for oconv
222.13 for rpict 
  0.29 for pfilt


Using openmosix with my 2 node cluster 
(
the second machine has a different processor:
model name      : Intel(R) Pentium(R) 4 CPU 2.26GHz
cpu MHz         : 2254.028
)


and rpiece with a 4x4 grid subdivision I got:


156.92 for rpict


I could do a better time with a symmetric system, but
the AMD Opteron seems to rule ...




Francesco
